title: Difference between LOL and DOTA2
body:
I am Asian so this is not racist. Apologies for having Russians.

Original here : cdn.themis-media.com/media/global/images/library/deriv/674/674451.jpg

replies.body:
I never get Chinese speaking players.. Or anyone who's obviously Russian. In fact, I got them more at DoTA 2. 

The main difference to me is the community.

Rito emphasizes champion diversity and people often complain about champions being OP to ridiculous levels. There's some pretty hard hating here and I often fall for it too.

Volvo emphasizes elitism and everyone is fine about openly admitting a hero is OP, if it's only usable by high MMR players. I got flamed for asking for more options in controls, as it would make heroes unbalanced if newer players could play them more easily.


I really prefer LoL TBH, but I wouldn't be posting here if I didn't like the game, so it's pretty expected which most people would prefer in the boards.
